title: Projects
description: Some of the projects are part of learning process, for example Song-Bird game was made to prepare for learn React, or Online-Store it's more about sorting, then styling.
online-zoo: Learn css and DOM-tree, mostly interesting part was implement slider and randomly shuffle cards.
gem-puzzle: Learned some topics like: generating random numbers, shuffling arrays, handling mouse and keyboard events, as well as managing elements on the page.
song-bird: Quiz game about birds, you need to guess the bird by singing. Trying to write a SPA application, without frameworks.
react-online-store: SPA on React, different sorting methods and React context.
